text: Yes exactly - I just can’t figure out how to use them, but perhaps it’s best that I do not.. Better to not get attached :wink:

Hello, I would like to +1 this experience
We are adding opportunities to the contact and trying to get them to automatically show on the contacts page
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> has the team come up with any solution yet, or as a workaround is there a way to cause a reload of the page to force the new data load?

Hey everyone. Been working on a UI Extension with hs project dev and at some point the debugger disconnected. My dev sandbox still shows "Developing Locally" but I'm not. When I try to reconnect, I get a "waiting for the debugger to disconnect..." message. Is there a way to force disconnect or something? How do I fix this? Refresh doesn't do it.

Hi <@U0764EN4XKJ> :wave:, it sounds like you might possibly have an instance of the `hs project dev` command running in the background.

The easiest possible solution would be to try restarting your machine and see if that resolves the issue.  Alternatively, you could look at all of the running `node` processes on your machine and try to narrow them down to the one running `hs project dev` and terminate that.
